WorkItem.Description:
There are Content Management Systems (CMS / Blogs, etc.) that scroll the message entry box when the cursor is over it and the mouse-wheel is used.  Otherwise the entire page is scrolled.
 
When inspecting my character in the browser and clicking on a gear-piece, a sub-window gear appears.  This sub-window can only be scrolled by click-dragging the position indicator.
 
What is the possibility of scrolling the sub-window with the mouse-wheel similar to Rawr 2.3.13?

Comments.Message: Mousewheel scrolling is definitely on our todo list, just haven't gotten to it yet.

Two articles describe an implementation for MouseWheel scrolling (since the SL devs don't seem to be intelligent to enough to just make it support mousewheel scrolling natively).
http://forums.silverlight.net/forums/p/109341/247677.aspx
http://www.silverlightplayground.org/post/2009/07/10/Silverlight-30-RTW-An-universal-MouseWheelScrolling-behavior.aspx
